summary: Daedric Armor from the Morrowind Era.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]CREDIT GOES TO MCMUFFIN FOR HIS DAEDRIC LORD ARMOR, AND TO NATTERFORME FOR PORTING IT TO SKYRIM.
[/size]
Adds "Third-Era Daedric Armor." Basically just McMuffin's Daedric Lord Armor, but truer to the original Morrowind design. 

The models have been tweaked in NifSkope (Made pauldrons, greaves and boots bigger. I don't know why one pauldron looks bigger than the other, it usually looks normal.) 

I've made a new .ESP file and changed the values of the armor to equal the Daedric armor from Morrowind. I also put a set inside the Shrine of Mehrunes Dagon. 

Textures are from Morrowind so they're obviously not going to be like 10 bajillion K in resolution.
author: NaziPunk434
